column4: does anyone know anything about the error "grub-mkconfig couldn't be executed successfully. You must run this as root!" with grub-customizer?
i'm getting the error grub-mkconfig couldn't be executed successfully. You must run this as root! I ran gksu grub-mkconfig and it stops after BEGIN /etc/grub.d/05_debian_theme ###
do you think it would have anything to do with windows 7 being my default os?
